# delegate

**Instance Property**

The document menu’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UIDocumentMenuDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentMenuDelegate] protocol.

## Getting the user-selected document picker

- **UIDocumentMenuDelegate**: A set of methods that you must implement to track user interactions with a document menu view controller.
